server.description: Express.js backend server with MongoDB integration and JWT authentication

files.description: Express server entry point - sets up CORS, JSON parsing, routes, and listens on port 5000
MongoDB connection using Mongoose, connects to localhost:27017/maja_umred_db by default
User schema with name, email, password (hashed), role (citizen/admin/official), ward, idProofType, idProofNumber
Authentication routes with POST /register and POST /login endpoints, returns JWT token on success

endpoints.description: Register new user with name, email, password, ward, idProofType, idProofNumber
Authenticate user with email/password, returns JWT token

frontend.description: Next.js 14 App Router frontend with Material-UI components

layout.description: Root layout with Google Fonts, Material Icons, Navbar, main content area, and Footer

globalStyles.description: TailwindCSS imports, CSS variables for Indian tricolor theme

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" - Runs both servers
scripts.dev:backend: nodemon server/index.js - Starts Express on port 5000
scripts.dev:frontend: next dev - Starts Next.js on port 3000
scripts.build: next build - Builds production Next.js bundle
scripts.start: node server/index.js - Starts production Express server
